document.masterDocTitle: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

bibRefCitation.author: Brady & Norman

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ilyocypris australiensis Sars, 1889
: AT, AU, OL, PA

Ilyocypris bradyi Sars, 1890
: NA, NT, OL, PA

Syn.:
Ilyocypris gibba var. repens Vávra, 1891
(fide Klie 1938a )

Syn.:
Ilyocypris bradyi var. compressa Masi, 1906
(fide Martens & Savatenalinton 2011 )

Syn.:
Ilyocypris bradyi var. brachytela Gauthier, 1938
(fide Martens & Savatenalinton 2011 )

Syn.:
Ilyocypris iners Kaufmann, 1900
(unused older synonym) (fide Meisch 2000 )

Syn.:
Ilyocypris iners var. affinis Masi, 1906
(fide
Pieri et al. 2015
)

Syn.:
Ilyocypris decipiens
f.
almi Sywula, 1974
(fide Meisch 2000 )
Ilyocypris dentifera Sars, 1903
: OL, PA
